channel.title: linux on Regina
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Regina

item.title: Linux基础操作
item.description: 1. 必备命令 类型 相关命令 帮助 –help, man, which, clear, > , mtools 查看 echo, cat, more, find, grep, | 目录 cd , ls, pwd 安装、登陆 login, shutdown, halt, reboot, install, mount, umount, chsh, exit, last 文件操作 touch, mkdir, rm, rmdir, mv, cp, ln, file, dd, diff 解、压缩 tar, gzip, bzip2, zip, unzip, gunzip, unarj, uuencode, uudecode 系统管理 whoami, df, top, free, quota, at, lp, adduser, groupadd, kill, crontab 系统安全 passwd, su, umask, chgrp, chmod, chomd, chown, chattr, sudo ps, who 网络操作 ifconfig, ip, ping, netstat, telnet, ftp, route, rlogin, rcp, finger, rcp, finger, mail, nslookup
